title: How to Get STARZ for Free

steps.title: Add STARZ as a channel in Amazon Prime Video.
steps.content: Add STARZ as a channel in Amazon Prime Video. Amazon Prime allows its subscribers to add additional channels to their subscription, connecting other streaming services or premium channels. Click here to find STARZ on Prime Video.

steps.title: Activate your seven-day free trial.
steps.content: Activate your seven-day free trial. When you add a STARZ channel to Prime, you will begin with a seven-day free trial. After that, your subscription will renew at $9.99/month. If you do not want to pay for STARZ, set a reminder to cancel your subscription before it renews.

steps.title: Navigate to your Hulu account settings.
steps.content: Navigate to your Hulu account settings. Sign in to your Hulu account if you have not already, and select Manage Account .

steps.title: Click Manage next to the Add-ons section.
steps.content: Click Manage next to the Add-ons section. You will see your add-ons listed here. If you do not have any yet, it will say "None added".

steps.title: Find STARZ and select the + button.
steps.content: Find STARZ and select the + button. Be sure to confirm the details of Hulu's offer. Hulu generally offers a seven-day free trial, after which STARZ renews at $9.99/month. This offer is subject to change, however.

steps.title: Finalize your purchase.
steps.content: Finalize your purchase. Click Review Changes and then Confirm to complete your purchase. If you do not want to pay for STARZ, set a reminder to cancel your subscription before it renews.

steps.title: Visit https://www.starz.com/us/en/signup.
steps.content: Visit https://www.starz.com/us/en/signup . STARZ does not offer a free trial directly, but they still offer the best deal if you are willing to pay for the service. The offer from STARZ tends to change (the popular $20 for 6 months offer is no longer available, for example) but it will always be cheaper than buying STARZ through a third-party, even with the weeklong free trial.
